mapper.select: SELECT u.NICK, SUBSTR(r.CREATEDATE,1,11) as CREATEDATE, r.CSAT , r.`HELP`,r.CONTENT, p.U_IMG_NAME, p.U_IMG_PATH, ri.R_IMG_NAME, ri.R_IMG_PATH , r.OPTION_NAME FROM t3_tbl_user_review r INNER JOIN t3_tbl_user u ON r.USER_NO = u.USER_NO LEFT JOIN t3_tbl_review_image ri ON ri.R_NO = r.R_NO LEFT JOIN t3_tbl_profile_image p ON p.USER_NO = u.USER_NO WHERE r.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} ORDER BY r.CREATEDATE desc LIMIT #{startNum}, #{lastNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t3_tbl_user_review WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS csatCnt, csat FROM t3_tbl_user_review WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} GROUP BY csat ORDER BY csat desc
SELECT * FROM t3_tbl_user_order o INNER JOIN t3_tbl_product_option p ON o.OPTION_NO = p.OPTION_NO WHERE o.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} AND o.USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t3_tbl_user_review(USER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, CONTENT, CSAT, OPTION_NAME) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{productNo}, #{reviewText}, #{csat}, #{optionName})
